name: SKPaymentQueueDelegate
desc: The protocol implemented to provide information needed to complete transactions.

items.name: func paymentQueue(SKPaymentQueue, shouldContinue: SKPaymentTransaction, in: SKStorefront) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate if the transaction should continue if the device's App Store storefront has changed during a transaction.

items.name: func paymentQueueShouldShowPriceConsent(SKPaymentQueue) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether to immediately display a price consent sheet.
